text: Dabbing, or the dab, is a simple dance move in which a person drops their head into their bent upwardly angled arm, while raising the opposite arm out straight in a parallel direction. Since 2015, dabbing has been used as a playful manner, becoming a youthful fad and Internet meme. The move looks like someone sneezing into their elbow. ==References== Category:Internet memes Category:Dance
title: Dab (dance)
